publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4657 Ross Finnie: Celebrate Gourock Outdoor Pool’s Centenary—That the Parliament joins in celebrating the centenary of Gourock Outdoor Pool, the oldest and one of only two outdoor pools remaining in Scotland; acknowledges the enjoyment that the pool has given to generations of families over the years and the contribution that it has made to the promotion of swimming in the area, and hopes that it will continue to be a major local and Scottish leisure facility in the years to come. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor*, Kenneth Gibson*, Mike Pringle*, Jackie Baillie*, Jackson Carlaw*, Stuart McMillan*, Maureen Watt*, Bill Kidd*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-4657 Celebrate Gourock Outdoor Pool’s Centenary (lodged on 4 August 2009) Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-4657 Celebrate Gourock Outdoor Pool’s Centenary (lodged on 4 August 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
